name: The Pyramids
uniques: [Builder] units gain the [Build Charge I] promotion
uniques.quote: 'O, let not the pains of death which come upon thee enter into my body. I am the god Tem, and I am the foremost part of the sky, and the power which protecteth me is that which is with all the gods forever.' - The Book of the Dead, translated by Sir Ernest Alfred Wallis Budge

uniques.name: Guildhall
uniques: All newly-trained [Builder] units [in this city] receive the [Build Charge II] promotion

uniques.name: Public Works Administration
uniques: [+25]% Production when constructing [Civilian] units [in all cities]
[Builder] units gain the [Build Charge III] promotion
Cost increases by [30] per owned city
